list_definition.definition: a competition to find who or which is the fastest

list_definition.mean_english: tham gia cuộc đua, cuộc thi
list_definition.definition: to (cause to) run in a race

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m racing my horse on Saturday

list_definition.definition: to have a competition with (someone) to find out who is the fastest

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ll race you to that tree.
He raced along the road on his bike.

list_definition.definition: any one section of mankind, having a particular set of characteristics which make it different from other sections
the fact of belonging to any of these various sections

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It is illegal to discriminate against anyone because of race.

list_definition.definition: a group of people who share the same culture, language etc; the Anglo-Saxon race.
